name: DuckyOh
description:
Made for LameJam 18
Theme: Ducks

I wanted an excuse to make a card game. It turnt out to be even harder to make than expected.

This is a very simple card game loosely based on YuGiOh. You fight an AI, both of you having a randomly generated deck. There are 2 monster zones, 2 spell zones and a graveyard.

Rules:
- You can summon one duck per turn, it can instantly attack (switch to  top view and click on it while on the field)
- You can summon rank 0 and rank 1 ducks for free, to summon rank 2 or higher you need to already have a duck on the field
- Ducks can attack once per turn
- Spells are instant

Controls:
Left Click - Select card
Right Click - Move between Top and Hand view
ESC - Open pause menu
